definitions.definition: Pertaining to the Perm region of Russia, or its inhabitants.
Pertaining to the last geologic period of the Paleozoic era ; comprising the Cisuralian , Guadalupian and Lopingian epochs from about 280 to 248 million years ago.

main_definition: Pertaining to the Perm region of Russia, or its inhabitants. [from 18th c.]
secondary_definitions: Pertaining to their language; Permic . [from 18th c.]
( geology ) Pertaining to the last geologic period of the Paleozoic era ; comprising the Cisuralian , Guadalupian and Lopingian epochs from about 280 to 248 million years ago. [from 19th c.]
